name: @walkeros/simulator
description: WalkerOS event processing simulator for deterministic pipeline testing

scripts.clean: rm -rf .turbo && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm -rf coverage
scripts.simulate: npm run build && node dist/cli.js -f examples/flow-config.json -e examples/test-events.json
scripts.simulate:summary: npm run build && node dist/cli.js -f examples/flow-config.json -e examples/test-events.json -o summary
scripts.simulate:json: npm run build && node dist/cli.js -f examples/flow-config.json -e examples/test-events.json -o json
scripts.simulate:table: npm run build && node dist/cli.js -f examples/flow-config.json -e examples/test-events.json -o table
scripts.simulate:basic: npm run build && node dist/cli.js -f examples/basic-flow.json -e examples/basic-event.json

author: elbwalker <hello@elbwalker.com>
